# gyne PIE gʷḗn queen

𐀓𐀙𐀊 ku-na-ja γυναία "woman" 𐀓𐀙𐀑𐀯 ku-na-ki-si γυναιξί

𒃽 ugunu₂ 'gyne "lady; mistress, proprietress"

gene genesis genu genie
Female syllable ⇔ youth, gymnasium
Female syllable ⇔ consort kin

𒊩 𒆳 GEME₂ γᾰμος gamos ⲍⲁⲙⲟⲥ جنجۍ ǰanǰə́y bride@groom
𒊩𒆳;𒄄𒅔 geme₂;gi4-in geme gymne gini "female worker" ⇔ 𒌉𒁹 genna young child

𒌍 𒌋𒌋 sin-niš gynes female women

♀ Venus
𒉿𒉿𒈾𒀸 /wānas/ woman @ womb =
𒉿𒈾𒀜𒋾𒅖 /wanattis/ woman

𒃶 gan gene gyne bear young; child-bearing

𓐍 𓈖 𓌰 𓅓 𓏏 𓂉 𓁐 | prostitute | √gyne Nutte <!>
𓐍 𓈖 𓌰 𓅓 𓏏 𓁕 | nurse | •gynomate > negovatèljica
𓐍 𓈖 𓌰 𓅓 𓏏 𓁕 | nurse | Kinders-Mutter q’nutrice-mother
𓐍 𓈖 𓌰 𓅓 𓋴 𓁒 𓀀 | friend | con com… Kumpel compagnon compāniō (with bread) compadre …
𓐍 𓈖 𓌰 𓅓 𓂉 𓀁 | breathe| hingama @ Estonian 𓌰⋍g? αναπνέω anapnéo 𓌰⋍pm⋍pn ?

𒂼𒃶 ama-gan √gyne "breeding female animal child-bearing mother" #ummu walittu
𒂼 ≈ 𒂷+𒀭 GY+AN gyne gvyne Giana Gyne queen > Anika Anna нана nana / ummu : Mother

𜏥𜎂 zana žaná жана́ зан@Tajik gyne san 𓊃 𓏏 𓁐 zant жанчы́на žančýna Jeanne Jana ⇔ жаңа "new" "and"

Geisha

𒎏 GAŠAN 𒂵𒊭𒀭 𒂵𒃻𒀭 𒅗𒊭𒀭 ga-ša-an ga-ša₂an ka-ša-an lady, mistress (also male!) 𒃽 GAŠAN 芸者 geisha(san) 芸子 geiko 芸妓 geigi 𒃽 GAŠAN Geisha gynes lady
𒃽 GAŠAN ga-ša-an rather than standard nin, "lady" in 𒅴𒊩 eme-sal “womens speech”
𒃽 Geisha > Ische
𒅖 𒋗 𒌑 iš-šu-ú Ischen : women אִשָּׁה ʾiššâ ܐܢܬܬܐ ʾa(n)tθ ante andere 𒊩 sinništ con.ist

𓎼 𓂜 𓈖 𓀉 | weak |gwan @ Breton kangy gyenge gyönge@HUN
𓎼 𓂜 𓈖 𓀉 | weak |gwan ⇔ gyne 𓎼𓈖 kein 𓂜𓈖𓀉 Cain & Abel 𓌤 & 𓐑𓊪𓃒

𓊃 𓈙 𓏮 𓅹 | nest | zhnízdo @ CES > гнездо́ gnezdó > घोंसला ghonslā ⇔ gyneshto!!

gymne •gymene sym-man

𒌍 𒌋𒌋 sinniš gynes women ⇔ yin 阴

𒎎 𒌓𒉌 čito-NE Šatti-NE “stone” 𒎎 ZA.NA in 𒍝𒉌𒌓 za₂ "gem" ≈ gyne
